extension.summary: Watch full episodes and movies on demand from the CW
extension.description: The CW Television Network is an American English language broadcast television network that is operated by The CW Network, LLC, a joint venture between CBS Corporation and Warner Bros. Entertainment. The "CW" name is an acronym derived from the first letters of the names of its two parent corporations (CBS and Warner Bros.).
extension.news: Version 2025.10.04 - Updated to include on demand movies from CW website. Code compliance for Kodi makes this version incompatible with Matrix.
